A4.text: In 2011, he began a recurring role as Judge Owen French on the Lifetime legal drama/fantasy series Drop Dead Diva, and became a main cast member for that show's fourth season (2012).

A5.text: He recently starred as a judge and love interest of the main character on the Lifetime series Drop Dead Diva.
